words.translation: Qaf|By the Quran|the Glorious

translations.1: Qaaaf; wal-Qur-aanil Majeed
translations.15: Qãf. By the glorious Quran

words.translation: Nay|they wonder|that|has come to them|a warner|from them|So say|the disbelievers|This|(is) a thing|amazing

translations.1: Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb
translations.15: ˹All will be resurrected,˺ yet the deniers are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves ˹warning of resurrection˺. So the disbelievers say, “This is an astonishing thing

words.translation: What! When|we die|and have become|dust|That|(is) a return|far

translations.1: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed
translations.15: ˹Will we be returned to life,˺ when we are dead and reduced to dust? Such a return is impossible.”

words.translation: Certainly|We know|what|diminishes|the earth|of them|and with Us|(is) a Book|guarded

translations.1: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul ardu minhum Wa-'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez
translations.15: We certainly know what the earth consumes of them ˹after their death˺, and with us is a well-preserved Record

words.translation: Nay|they denied|the truth|when|it came (to) them|so they|(are) in|a state|confused

translations.1: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej
translations.15: In fact, they reject the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a confused state

words.translation: Then do not|they look|at|the sky|above them|how|We structured it|and adorned it|and not|for it|any|rifts

translations.1: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa Wa-zaiyannaahaa Wa-maa lahaa min furooj
translations.15: Have they not then looked at the sky above them: how We built it and adorned it ˹with stars˺, leaving it flawless

words.translation: And the earth|We have spread it out|and cast|therein|firmly set mountains|and We made to grow|therein|of|every|kind|beautiful

translations.1: Wal-arda madadnaahaa Wa-alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya Wa-ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim baheej
translations.15: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and produced in it every type of pleasant plant—

words.translation: Giving insight|and a reminder|for every|slave|who turns

translations.1: Tabsiratanw Wa-zikraa likulli 'abdim muneeb
translations.15: ˹all as˺ an insight and a reminder to every servant who turns ˹to Allah˺

words.translation: And We have sent down|from|the sky|water|blessed|then We made to grow|thereby|gardens|and grain|(for) the harvest

translations.1: Wa-nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa-ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw Wa-habbal haseed
translations.15: And We send down blessed rain from the sky, bringing forth gardens and grains for harvest

words.translation: And the palms trees|tall|for it|(are) layers|arranged

translations.1: Wannakhla baasiqaatil laha tal'un nadeed
translations.15: and towering palm trees ˹loaded˺ with clustered fruit

words.translation: A provision|for the slaves|and We give life|therewith|(to) a land|dead|Thus|(will be) the coming forth

translations.1: Rizqal lil'ibaad, Wa-ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj
translations.15: ˹as˺ a provision for ˹Our˺ servants. And with this ˹rain˺ We revive a lifeless land. Similar is the emergence ˹from the graves˺

words.translation: Denied|before them|(the) people|(of) Nuh|and (the) companions|(of) Ar-Raas|and Thamud

translations.1: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-Ashaabur Rassi Wa-Samood
translations.15: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth,˺ as did the people of the Water-pit, Thamûd

words.translation: And Aad|and Firaun|and (the) brothers|(of) Lut

translations.1: Wa-'Aadunw Wa-Fir'awnu wikhwaanu loot
translations.15: ’Ȃd, Pharaoh, the kinfolk of Lot

words.translation: And (the) companions|(of) the wood|and (the) people|(of) Tubba|All|denied|the Messengers|so was fulfilled|My Threat

translations.1: Wa-Ashaabul Aykati Wa-qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed
translations.15: the residents of the Forest, and the people of Tubba’. Each rejected ˹their˺ messenger, so My warning was fulfilled

words.translation: Were We then tired|with the creation|the first|Nay|they|(are) in|doubt|about|a creation|new

translations.1: Afa'a-yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed
translations.15: Were We incapable of creating ˹them˺ the first time? In fact, they are in doubt about ˹their˺ re-creation

words.translation: And certainly|We created|man|and We know|what|whispers|to him|his soul|and We|(are) nearer|to him|than|(his) jugular vein|(his) jugular vein

translations.1: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana Wa-na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo Wa-Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed
translations.15: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ created humankind and ˹fully˺ know what their souls whisper to them, and We are closer to them than ˹their˺ jugular vein

words.translation: When|receive|the two receivers|on|the right|and on|the left|seated

translations.1: Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi-yaani 'anil yameeni Wa-'anish shimaali qa'eed
translations.15: As the two recording-angels—˹one˺ sitting to the right, and ˹the other to˺ the left—note ˹everything˺

words.translation: Not|he utters|any|word|but|with him|(is) an observer|ready

translations.1: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed
translations.15: not a word does a person utter without having a ˹vigilant˺ observer ready ˹to write it down˺

words.translation: And will come|(the) stupor|(of) death|in truth|That|(is) what|you were|[from it]|avoiding

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'at sakratul mawti bilhaqq; zaalika maa kunta minhu taheed
translations.15: ˹Ultimately,˺ with the throes of death will come the truth. This is what you were trying to escape

words.translation: And will be blown|[in]|the trumpet|That|(is the) Day|(of) the Warning

translations.1: Wa-nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed
translations.15: And the Trumpet will be blown. This is the Day ˹you were˺ warned of

words.translation: And will come|every|soul|with it|a driver|and a witness

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw Wa-shaheed
translations.15: Each soul will come forth with an angel to drive it and another to testify

words.translation: Certainly|you were|in|heedlessness|of|this|So We have removed|from you|your cover|so your sight|today|(is) sharp

translations.1: Laqad kunta fee ghaf-latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadeed
translations.15: ˹It will be said to the denier,˺ “You were totally heedless of this. Now We have lifted this veil of yours, so Today your sight is sharp!”

words.translation: And (will) say|his companion|This|(is) what|(is) with me|ready

translations.1: Wa-qaala qareenuhoo haazaa maa ladaiya 'ateed
translations.15: And one’s accompanying-angel will say, “Here is the record ready with me.”

words.translation: Throw|into|Hell|every|disbeliever|stubborn

translations.1: Alqiyaa fee Jahannama kulla kaffaarin 'aneed
translations.15: ˹It will be said to both angels,˺ “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever

words.translation: Forbidder|of good|transgressor|doubter

translations.1: Mannaa'il lilkhayri mu'tadim mureeb
translations.15: withholder of good, transgressor, and doubter

words.translation: Who|made|with|Allah|a god|another|so throw him|in(to)|the punishment|the severe

translations.1: Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa-alqiyaahu fil 'azaabish shadeed
translations.15: who set up another god with Allah. So cast them into the severe punishment.”

words.translation: Will say|his companion|Our Lord|not|I made him transgress|but|he was|in|error|far

translations.1: Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo Wa-laakin kaana fee dalaalin ba'eed
translations.15: One’s ˹devilish˺ associate will say, “Our Lord! I did not make them transgress. Rather, they were far astray ˹on their own˺.”

words.translation: He will say|(Do) not|dispute|(in) My presence|and indeed|I sent forth|to you|the Warning

translations.1: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya Wa-qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed
translations.15: Allah will respond, “Do not dispute in My presence, since I had already given you a warning

words.translation: Not|will be changed|the word|with Me|and not|I Am|unjust|to My slaves

translations.1: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya Wa-maaa ana bizal-laamil lil'abeed
translations.15: My Word cannot be changed, nor am I unjust to ˹My˺ creation.”

words.translation: (The) Day|We will say|to Hell|Are|you filled|And it will say|Are|(there) any|more

translations.1: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati Wa-taqoolu hal mim mazeed
translations.15: ˹Beware of˺ the Day We will ask Hell, “Are you full ˹yet˺?” And it will respond, “Are there any more?”

words.translation: And will be brought near|the Paradise|to the righteous|not|far

translations.1: Wa-uzlifatil jannatu lil-muttaqeena ghaira ba'eed
translations.15: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far off

words.translation: This|(is) what|you were promised|for everyone|who turns|(and) who keeps

translations.1: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez
translations.15: ˹And it will be said to them,˺ “This is what you were promised, for whoever ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺ and kept up ˹His commandments˺—

words.translation: Who|feared|the Most Gracious|in the unseen|and came|with a heart|returning

translations.1: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi Wa-jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb
translations.15: who were in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing ˹Him˺, and have come with a heart turning ˹only to Him˺

words.translation: Enter it|in peace|That|(is) a Day|(of) Eternity

translations.1: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin zaalika yawmul khulood
translations.15: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of eternal life!”

words.translation: For them|whatever|they wish|therein|and with Us|(is) more

translations.1: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa Wa-ladainaa mazeed
translations.15: There they will have whatever they desire, and with Us is ˹even˺ more

words.translation: And how many|We destroyed|before them|of|a generation|they|(were) stronger|than them|(in) power|so they explored|throughout|the lands|Is (there)|any|place of escape

translations.1: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fil bilaad, hal mim mahees
translations.15: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, who were far mightier than them. Then ˹when the torment came,˺ they ˹desperately˺ sought refuge in the land. ˹But˺ was there any escape

words.translation: Indeed|in|that|surely, is a reminder|for (one) who|is|for him|a heart|or|(who) gives ear|(who) gives ear|while he|(is) a witness

translations.1: Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a Wa-huwa shaheed
translations.15: Surely in this is a reminder for whoever has a ˹mindful˺ heart and lends an attentive ear

words.translation: And certainly|We created|the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between both of them|in|six|periods|and (did) not|touch Us|any|fatigue

translations.1: Wa-laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin Wa-maa massanaa mil lughoob
translations.15: Indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, and We were not ˹even˺ touched with fatigue

words.translation: So be patient|over|what|they say|and glorify|(the) praise|(of) your Lord|before|(the) rising|(of) the sun|and before|the setting

translations.1: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qablal ghuroob
translations.15: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And glorify the praises of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset

words.translation: And of|the night|glorify Him|and after|the prostration

translations.1: Wa-minal laili fasabbih-hu Wa-adbaaras sujood
translations.15: And glorify Him during part of the night and after the prayers

words.translation: And listen!|(The) Day|will call|the caller|from|a place|near

translations.1: Wastami' yawma yunaa-dil munaadi mim makaanin qareeb
translations.15: And listen! On the Day the caller will call out from a near place

words.translation: (The) Day|they will hear|the Blast|in truth|That|(is the) Day|(of) coming forth

translations.1: Yawma yasmaoonas sai-hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj
translations.15: the Day all will hear the ˹mighty˺ Blast in ˹all˺ truth, that will be the Day of emergence ˹from the graves˺

words.translation: Indeed We|[We]|[We] give life|and [We] cause death|and to Us|(is) the final return

translations.1: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee Wa-numeetu Wa-ilainal maseer
translations.15: It is certainly We Who give life and cause death. And to Us is the final return

words.translation: (The) Day|will split|the earth|from them|hurrying|That|(is) a gathering|for Us|easy

translations.1: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer
translations.15: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the earth will split open, letting them rush forth. That will be an easy gathering for Us

words.translation: We|know best|[of] what|they say|and not|(are) you|over them|the one to compel|But remind|with the Quran|whoever|fears|My threat

translations.1: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil-quraani maien yakhaafu wa'eed
translations.15: We know best what they say. And you ˹O Prophet˺ are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺. So remind with the Quran ˹only˺ those who fear My warning
